TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WizardStepBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.View
Public MustInherit Class WizardStepBase Inherits View
public ref class WizardStepBase abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::View

summary.span: 實作 控制項步驟需要的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a step in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法直接建立的執行個體類別。You cannot directly create an instance of the class. 反之，此類別繼承自類別和類別提供的步驟，以做為精靈控制項中的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the class and the class to provide the basic functionality of a step in a control that acts as a wizard. 您可以從衍生類別來建立自訂的類別，表示精靈控制項中的唯一步驟。You can derive from the class to create a custom class that represents a unique step in a wizard control.

related.span: 精靈 Web 伺服器控制項

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許使用者從 集合的後續步驟返回目前步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a collection.

value.span: 如果允許使用者返回目前步驟，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the current step; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來強制執行中的線性導覽控制項。The property can be used to enforce linear navigation in a control. 如果每個步驟都與其屬性設定為`false`，使用者將無法返回步驟之後已被存取。If each step has its property set to `false`, the user will not be able to return to a step after it has been accessed. 您可以在其中使用這項功能的其中一個案例是不允許使用者返回步驟，因為您會將資料保存到資料庫作為每個步驟完成之後完成。One scenario where you might use this functionality is to disallow a user to return to a step after it has been completed because you are persisting the data to a database as each step is completed. 如果您將資料儲存在每個步驟之後，可讓使用者回到的步驟，並儲存它之後，變更資訊已儲存的資料可能會損毀。If you save the data after each step and allow the user to return to a step and change information after it has been saved, the saved data might become corrupted. 藉由設定屬性設`false`之後使用者已離開的步驟，, 他或她將無法返回並變更任何值。By setting the property to `false`, once the user has left a step, he or she will not be able to return to it and change any values. 屬性會決定如何及何時**Previous**不會呈現按鈕。The property determines how and when the **Previous** button is not rendered. 下表描述**Previous**按鈕呈現行為。The following table describes the **Previous** button rendering behavior. |情節Scenario|行為Behavior| |--------------|--------------| |線性：步驟 1 已設定為`false`和使用者動作將會前往步驟 2。Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 2.|步驟 2 不會顯示**Previous** 按鈕。Step 2 does not display the **Previous** button.| |非線性：步驟 1 已設定為`false`和使用者動作會移至步驟 3。Non-Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 3.|步驟 3 不會顯示**Previous** 按鈕。Step 3 does not display the **Previous** button.| |提要欄位按鈕：步驟 2 中有設定為`false`，設定為`true`，使用者按一下 [資訊看板] 按鈕。SideBar Buttons: Step 2 has set to `false` , is set to `true`, and a user clicks on the SideBar button.|[資訊看板] 會自動停用的按鈕時設為`false`。No buttons are automatically disabled on the sidebar when is set to `false`. 如果使用者按一下按鈕時，會忽略該動作。If a user clicks the button, the action is ignored.| |線性與非線性自訂範本：此步驟中有自訂巡覽樣板。Linear & Non-Linear with Custom Template: The step has a custom navigation template.|沒有自動如果隱藏或顯示就會發生設為`false`當您使用範本進行巡覽。No automatic hiding or displaying occurs if is set to `false` when you use a template for navigation. **Previous**按鈕應該是選擇性的範本。The **Previous** button should be optional on the template.| |使用 Visual Studio 設計工具和:控制項有 5 個步驟、 您正在使用步驟 4 中，而且您執行頁面。Using the Visual Studio Designer and : The control has 5 steps, you are working on step 4, and you run the page.|步驟 4 時，則**Previous**按鈕會呈現。When step 4 is the , then the **Previous** button is rendered. **上一步** 按鈕只會隱藏設定為當上一個步驟歷程記錄中的有設為`false`。The **Previous** button is only hidden for set to when the preceding step in the history has set to `false`. 步驟 4 會先轉譯，而且在歷程記錄中沒有任何步驟，因為**Previous**按鈕不會隱藏。Since step 4 is rendered first and there are no steps in the history, the **Previous** button is not hidden.| |啟動步驟和非線性導覽：使用者在步驟 3 和步驟 4 和步驟 1 已瀏覽設定為。Start Step and Non-Linear Navigation: A user visits step 3 and step 4 and then step 1 which has set to .|精靈不會新增**上一步**按鈕時設定為不論使用者如何瀏覽至該步驟。The wizard does not add a **Previous** button when the is set to regardless of how the user navigates to that step.| |歷程記錄中的相同步驟：使用者瀏覽步驟 3 所在設為和使用者不會認可其動作。Same Step In History: A user visits step 3 where is set to and the user does not commit their actions. 它們然後按一下 [一步] 按鈕步驟 3。They then click on the previous button on step 3.|精靈控制項會檢查是否要**Previous**歷程記錄中的步驟是使用者目前所在的 「 相同 」 步驟。The wizard control checks to see if the **Previous** step in the history is the "same" step that the user is currently on. 如果步驟都相同，wizard 控制項往回查看歷程記錄，以判斷先前的 「 不同 」 步驟和基底的顯示**Previous**按鈕和目的地根據 「 不同的步驟 」 中的歷程記錄。If the step is the same, the wizard control looks back in the history to determine the preceding "different" step and bases the display of the **Previous** button and destination based on the "different step" in the history.| > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`false`，但屬性的父控制項設定為`true`，按一下按鈕，以在提要欄位區域中沒有任何作用。When the property is set to `false`, but the property of the parent control of is set to `true`, clicking on a button in the sidebar area has no effect. 提要欄位區域通常會顯示提供非線性導覽中，因此如果您未使用的非線性導覽功能，您可能需要設定屬性設`false`。The sidebar area is generally displayed to provide nonlinear navigation, so if you are not using the functionality of nonlinear navigation, you may want to set the property to `false`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以阻止使用者從傳回至在步驟後已存取控制。The following example demonstrates using the property to stop the user from returning to a step in the control after it has been accessed. 在範例中，`Step1`步驟中有其屬性設定為`false`。In the example, the `Step1` step has its property set to `false`. 使用者之後離開`Step1`步驟中，沒有 [上一步] 按鈕會出現在`Step2`步驟。After the user leaves the `Step1` step, no Previous button appears on the `Step2` step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/CS/wizardstepbaseallowreturncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/VB/wizardstepbaseallowreturnvb.aspx#1)]

member this.EnableTheming : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出佈景主題是否套用至此控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 屬性也會影響是否已啟用其控制項集合中所包含之控制項的佈景主題。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its controls collection. 當屬性是`true`，應用程式的佈景主題目錄中搜尋要套用控制面板。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果任何特定的控制項外觀的佈景主題目錄中，將不套用的外觀。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 時屬性是`false`，則不會搜尋佈景主題目錄，而不使用屬性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the value of the property is not used. 控制項可以覆寫值由其父控制項或包含頁面的設定。A control can override the value set by its parent control or by the containing page. 比方說，如果控制項有設為`false`，您可以選擇性地將佈景主題套用至子控制項包含在精靈步驟中的設定屬性設`true`個別子控制項。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the wizard step by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

related.span: 精靈 Web 伺服器控制項

summary.span: 取得或設定指派給伺服器控制項的程式設計識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.

value.span: 指派給控制項的程式設計識別項。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用找出並參考 Web Forms 網頁中的特定精靈步驟控制項的屬性。Use the property to identify and reference a particular wizard step control in a Web Forms page. 值會成為頁面中的控制項執行個體的名稱，這可讓您輕鬆地存取該頁面的程式碼中的特定步驟。The value becomes the name of the control instance in the page; this allows you to easily access a particular step in code for that page. 例如，如果您設定的屬性控制項至 「 步驟 1 」 中，您可以參考在該頁面的程式碼中的精靈步驟的子控制項`Step1.Controls`。For example, if you set the property of a control to "Step1", you can reference the child controls of the wizard step in code for that page as `Step1.Controls`. 控制項可確保每個步驟的步驟是新增或修改在設計階段時，控制項具有有效的唯一識別碼。The control ensures that each step in a control has a valid unique identifier when steps are added or modified at design time. 比方說，當您設定步驟在設計階段中，其無法符合另一個步驟中所包含的識別項控制項，以及其無法符合包含控制項。For example, when you set the for a step at design time, it cannot match the identifier for another step contained in the control, and it cannot match the for the containing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義三個精靈步驟Web Forms 網頁中的控制項。The following code example defines three wizard steps for a control in a Web Forms page. 頁面的程式碼，在精靈的步驟執行個體的命名方式是其識別碼的值，並做為程式碼中參考它們`WizardStep1`， `WizardStep2`，和`WizardStep3`。In code for the page, the wizard step instances are named by their ID values, and they can be referenced in the code as `WizardStep1`, `WizardStep2`, and `WizardStep3`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/CS/wizardactivestepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/VB/wizardactivestepvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為無效的識別項字串。

span.span: The property was set to an invalid identifier string at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為與包含 控制項相同的識別項。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as the containing control at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 該屬性在設計階段設為與包含 控制項中的其他步驟相同的識別項。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as another step in the containing control at design time.

span.span: The name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回字串，識別精靈控制項中的步驟。The property returns a string that identifies a step in a wizard control. 如果指定的值屬性，屬性會傳回該值。If a value is specified for the property, the property returns that value. 如果未不指定任何值，如屬性，屬性傳回的值屬性。If no value is specified for the property, the property returns the value of the property. 如果未指定值的其中一個或屬性，屬性會傳回`null`。If values are not specified for either the or the property, the property returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType StepType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType StepType
Public Overridable Property StepType As WizardStepType

member this.StepType : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定巡覽使用者介面 (UI) 的類型，以顯示 控制項中的步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of navigation user interface (UI) to display for a step in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性指定的型別中的步驟顯示導覽按鈕的控制項。Use the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display for a step in a control. 如果您指定這個屬性的值時，任何步驟，就會標示為會顯示在 資訊看板中停用狀態。If you specify a value for this property, any steps marked as displays in a disabled state in the sidebar. 如果您未指定此屬性的值，預設值是`WizardStepType.Auto`。If you do not specify a value for this property, the default is `WizardStepType.Auto`. 下表列出可用的設定屬性及步驟的結果行為：The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step: `WizardStepType.Auto` 巡覽某個步驟呈現出來的 UI 是由該步驟的宣告的順序決定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 此步驟為最後一個出現，The step is the last one to appear. 不會呈現巡覽按鈕。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 此步驟是收集資料的最後一個步驟，The step is the final data collection step. [完成] 和 [上一步] 按鈕會呈現巡覽。The Finish and Previous buttons are rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 此步驟為第一個出現，The step is the first one to appear. 上一步 按鈕不會呈現。A Previous button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 此步驟是開始和完成 步驟之間的任何步驟。The step is any step between the Start and the Finish step. 上一步 和 下一步 按鈕會呈現巡覽。Previous and Next buttons are rendered for navigation. 這種步驟類型有助於覆寫 步驟類型。This step type is useful for overriding the step type.

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

related.span: 精靈 Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: Wizard Web Server Control

.property instance string Title
Public Overridable Property Title As String

member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定標題，以便在啟用提要欄位功能時，用於 控制項中的步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.

value.span: 標題，在啟用提要欄位功能時，用於 控制項步驟。

span.span: The title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來顯示使用者易記的標題中的步驟控制啟用提要欄位功能時。Use the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled. 如果屬性未設定，並在啟用提要欄位功能時，值屬性會顯示 [資訊看板] 按鈕。If the property is not set and the sidebar feature is enabled, the value of the property is displayed for the sidebar button. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示使用者易記的標題中的步驟控制項。The following example demonstrates using the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in the control. 在範例中，`Step1`並沒有其屬性設定，因此它會出現在"WizardStep1 」 控制項。In the example, `Step1` does not have its property set, so it appears in the control as "WizardStep1". `Step2` 沒有其設定屬性，使其顯示為 [步驟 2]。`Step2` does have its property set, so it appears as "Step 2". [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/CS/wizardstepbasetitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/VB/wizardstepbasetitlevb.aspx#1)]
